name: Absolute Adventure Zero
description:
Absolute Adventure Zero is a role playing game set in a different (fictional) dimension,
it's graphics and sound department are inspired by older games of the same genre.
In this game you fight an insane mage,and his evil beings,to stop their evil plan.
The game sees (a different kind of) you as its main character.
You will face many enemies and explore a ton of dungeons,
but only at the end you will face the one who's behind this.
But becareful when taking IMPORTANT decisions as their
outcome might heavily affect the story of the game!
